# ChangeLog

## v4.8.0
* Added: JWT managed token support, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4790

## v4.6.0
* Added: Typescript support for oauth-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3697

## v4.5.1 && v4.5.2
* Switched to new service details API
* Corrected fallback to default app name logic
## v4.5.0
* Activated appmeta-ebay -> esams -> app secret logic and removed service details, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2976
* Switched off the use of 3rd party app names to getAppToken as applications are no longer allowed to use other app secrets
* Switched to new service details API

## v4.5.0-pre
* Activated appmeta-ebay -> esams -> app secret logic and removed service details, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2976
* Switched off the use of 3rd party app names to getAppToken as applications are no longer allowed to use other app secrets

## v4.3.3
* Reverted to original version 4.2.2 after esams changes were removed.

## v4.3.2 - reverted due to bad secre stored in esams channel
* Activated appmeta-ebay -> esams -> app secret logic and removed service details, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2976

## v4.2.2
* Dependency upgrades
* remove disabling TLS cert verification, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2675
## v4.2.1
Add: add sandbox configuration for oauth-ebay endpoints, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2871
## v4.2.0
* oauth-ebay token service migration to new service, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-2741

## v4.1.0
( Switch from short vip to long vip

## v4.0.9
* Updated oauth endpoint to generic CNAME: oauthclnt.vip.qa.ebay.com to avoid PHX migration issues.

## v4.0.8
* Removed explicitly defined discovery instrument
 
## v4.0.7
* Added urn for service-discovery

## v4.0.6
* Removed dustjs dependencies

## v4.0.5
* Fixed: Removed `outboundcontext` instrument from oauth as it is corrupting ENDUSERCONTEXT(CurrencyCode)

## v4.0.4
* Fixed: Suppressed calling eSAMS for oAuth https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1683

## v4.0.3
* Fix for public user tokens in oauth-ebay module, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1596

## v4.0.2
* Fixed: app token expiration should refresh token long before actual expiration happens, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1528

## v4.0.1
* Added better error messages for token scope and application type validation, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-1416

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.1.27
* Fix async rendering based on async-writer@v2 used by marko@v3.11.4 and later versions.

## v0.1.26
* Upgraded service-client-ebay to 1.0

## v0.1.25
* Override Client Secret from client detail service with App-Meta App-Secret since CDS will cease to provide client secret.

## v0.1.24
* Added: custom scopes for getRecognizedUserToken and getPublicRecognizedUserToken

## v0.1.23
* Marko v3 compatibility

## v0.1.22
* Allow the type of the token (App, User, RecognizedUser) to be specified as a tag attribute: https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-328

## v0.1.21
* Removed unnecessary code in the first commit introduced by a previous rebase (https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/oauth-ebay/blame/master/test/oauthTest.js#L36-L39)
* Added more details to the error message from when the scope is not permitted in the oauth flow.
* Added test for this error message.

## v0.1.20
* Removed unused dependencies

## v0.1.19
* Fixed: should not cache service details when type attribute is missing.
* Upgraded dependencies & Marko 2.x

## v0.1.18
* switched environment-inc to environment-ebay

## v0.1.17
* Fixed caching issue, memory-cache used cannot hold token longer than 24 days, which was breaking; switched it to LRU.

## v0.1.16
* Upgraded to iaf-ebay@^0.3
* Switched to short vip for service endpoints
* Switched from rest-ebay to service-client-ebay
* Code cleanup, removed unused code
* Fixed: recognized attribute was missing in enduser context

## v0.1.14
* Module oauth-ebay getPublicUserToken was fixed. The problem was token being rejected by COS service as unauthorized.
